content.query:
-- Create external table ExternalAggBluebike
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ExternalAggBluebike(
    date DATE, 
    riders INT,
    trips INT,
    stations INT,
    bikes_lost INT,
    bikes_not_returned INT,
    not_start_at_dock INT,
    avg_distance FLOAT,
    avg_duration FLOAT,
    avg_duration_min FLOAT,
    avg_duration_h FLOAT,
    avg_speed_ms FLOAT,
    avg_speed_kmh FLOAT,
    max_distance FLOAT,
    max_duration FLOAT,
    max_duration_min FLOAT,
    max_duration_h FLOAT,
    max_speed_ms FLOAT,
    max_speed_kmh FLOAT
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'gold/agg_bluebike/parquet/bluebike_agg.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = MyDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat
);
GO

-- Create external table ExternalBluebike
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ExternalBluebike(
    ride_id NVARCHAR(100),
    rideable_type NVARCHAR(100),
    started_at DATETIME,
    ended_at DATETIME,
    start_station_name NVARCHAR(100),
    start_station_id NVARCHAR(100),
    end_station_name NVARCHAR(100),
    end_station_id NVARCHAR(100),
    start_lat FLOAT,
    start_lng FLOAT,
    end_lat FLOAT,
    end_lng FLOAT,
    member_casual NVARCHAR(100),
    is_bike_lost INT,
    is_return_to_dock INT,
    is_start_from_dock INT,
    distance FLOAT,
    duration FLOAT,
    speed_ms FLOAT,
    speed_kmh FLOAT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    is_not_return_to_dock INT,
    is_not_start_from_dock INT,
    duration_min FLOAT,
    duration_h FLOAT
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'gold/bluebike/parquet/bluebike.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = MyDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat
);
GO

-- Create BlueBike table with matching data types (internal sql table)
CREATE TABLE BlueBike (
    ride_id NVARCHAR(100),
    rideable_type NVARCHAR(100),
    started_at DATETIME,
    ended_at DATETIME,
    start_station_name NVARCHAR(100),
    start_station_id NVARCHAR(100),
    end_station_name NVARCHAR(100),
    end_station_id NVARCHAR(100),
    start_lat FLOAT,
    start_lng FLOAT,
    end_lat FLOAT,
    end_lng FLOAT,
    member_casual NVARCHAR(100),
    is_bike_lost INT,
    is_return_to_dock INT,
    is_start_from_dock INT,
    distance FLOAT,
    duration FLOAT,
    speed_ms FLOAT,
    speed_kmh FLOAT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    is_not_return_to_dock INT,
    is_not_start_from_dock INT,
    duration_min FLOAT,
    duration_h FLOAT
);
GO

-- Insert data into BlueBike
INSERT INTO BlueBike (
    ride_id,
    rideable_type,
    started_at,
    ended_at,
    start_station_name,
    start_station_id,
    end_station_name,
    end_station_id,
    start_lat,
    start_lng,
    end_lat,
    end_lng,
    member_casual,
    is_bike_lost,
    is_return_to_dock,
    is_start_from_dock,
    distance,
    duration,
    speed_ms,
    speed_kmh,
    start_date,
    end_date,
    is_not_return_to_dock,
    is_not_start_from_dock,
    duration_min,
    duration_h
)
SELECT
    ride_id,
    rideable_type,
    started_at,
    ended_at,
    start_station_name,
    start_station_id,
    end_station_name,
    end_station_id,
    start_lat,
    start_lng,
    end_lat,
    end_lng,
    member_casual,
    is_bike_lost,
    is_return_to_dock,
    is_start_from_dock,
    distance,
    duration,
    speed_ms,
    speed_kmh,
    start_date,
    end_date,
    is_not_return_to_dock,
    is_not_start_from_dock,
    duration_min,
    duration_h
FROM 
    ExternalBluebike;
GO

-- Create AggBlueBike table with matching data types (internal sql table)
CREATE TABLE AggBlueBike (
    date DATE, 
    riders INT,
    trips INT,
    stations INT,
    bikes_lost INT,
    bikes_not_returned INT,
    not_start_at_dock INT,
    avg_distance FLOAT,
    avg_duration FLOAT,
    avg_duration_min FLOAT,
    avg_duration_h FLOAT,
    avg_speed_ms FLOAT,
    avg_speed_kmh FLOAT,
    max_distance FLOAT,
    max_duration FLOAT,
    max_duration_min FLOAT,
    max_duration_h FLOAT,
    max_speed_ms FLOAT,
    max_speed_kmh FLOAT
);
GO

-- Insert data into AggBlueBike
INSERT INTO AggBlueBike (
    date, 
    riders,
    trips,
    stations,
    bikes_lost,
    bikes_not_returned,
    not_start_at_dock,
    avg_distance,
    avg_duration,
    avg_duration_min,
    avg_duration_h,
    avg_speed_ms,
    avg_speed_kmh,
    max_distance,
    max_duration,
    max_duration_min,
    max_duration_h,
    max_speed_ms,
    max_speed_kmh
)
SELECT
    date, 
    riders,
    trips,
    stations,
    bikes_lost,
    bikes_not_returned,
    not_start_at_dock,
    avg_distance,
    avg_duration,
    avg_duration_min,
    avg_duration_h,
    avg_speed_ms,
    avg_speed_kmh,
    max_distance,
    max_duration,
    max_duration_min,
    max_duration_h,
    max_speed_ms,
    max_speed_kmh
FROM 
    ExternalAggBluebike;
GO

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM BlueBike;
SELECT TOP 10 * FROM AggBlueBike;
